main.description: List commitments. Filterable by: action, inputOf, outputOf, plannedWithin, independentDemandOf, resourceInventoriedAs, provider, receiver, satisfies, finished, stage, clauseOf, reciprocalClauseOf.

uri.description: Fetch a single record by AT-URI. Other filters are ignored when set.

inputOf.description: Filter by inputOf (AT-URI of referenced record).

outputOf.description: Filter by outputOf (AT-URI of referenced record).

plannedWithin.description: Filter by plannedWithin (AT-URI of referenced record).

independentDemandOf.description: Filter by independentDemandOf (AT-URI of referenced record).

resourceInventoriedAs.description: Filter by resourceInventoriedAs (AT-URI of referenced record).

provider.description: Filter by provider (DID of referenced agent).

receiver.description: Filter by receiver (DID of referenced agent).

satisfies.description: Filter where satisfies array contains this AT-URI.

stage.description: Filter by stage (AT-URI of referenced record).

clauseOf.description: Filter by clauseOf (AT-URI of referenced record).

reciprocalClauseOf.description: Filter by reciprocalClauseOf (AT-URI of referenced record).

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response.
